data.persona: I am old and near death. I have seen and learned many things. I wish I could live longer.
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passageway.
This is a narrow underground path that is surrounded by stone walls and a dirty and grimy floor.  Many insects and rodents dwell here underneath the temple.
There's an a dirty and grimy floor and a wall here.
The rodent is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a cloth.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the rodent because it's my only company in this hovel beneath the temple.
data.mid_motivation: I want some company to listen to stories of my childhood.
data.long_motivation: I'll die soon and don't want to be alone.
